post.text: The official campaign podcast With Her sat down with President Bill Clinton to talk pre-debate jitters (his) and Hillary's favorite reality TV show. Listen and subscribe here: hrc.io/2d2bC0Z

comment.author: Angela
comment.text: How do we shut her up? So sick and tired of her negativity. Nothing positive about her to talk about. Those endless commercials are nerve grating. I won't vote for her because I couldn't stand listening to her for 4 years. GO TRUMP! The positive candidate!

replies.author: Nicholas
replies.text: Those endless commercials are words that Trump used himself to denigrate people throughout the USA. Maybe he should just keep his comments to himself and you wouldn't have to listenðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚

replies.author: Nicholas
replies.text: Angela you put yourself in that basket ! I thought the kkk , the alt right, bigots , and racist were the only ones to be put in that basket? Are you admitting you are one of them?
